nio/SNMPGet.description: This block provides a SNMP Manager that runs inside nio.

agent_host.title: SNMP Agent Url
agent_host.description: The host IP for the SNMP Agent to which this manager will connect. Defaults to `127.0.0.1`.

agent_port.title: SNMP Agent Port
agent_port.description: The desired port for the Agent. Defaults to `161`

exclude_existing.title: Exclude Existing Values
exclude_existing.description: If false, the original input signal attributes will be included in the output signal.

lookup_names.title: Look up OID names
lookup_names.description: Lookup names when executing a SNMP GET. Converts to human readable string. Defaults to `False`

lookup_values.title: Look up OID values
lookup_values.description: Lookup values when executing a SNMP GET. Converts to human readable string. Defaults to `False`

retries.title: SNMP Retries
retries.description: Number of retries when executing a SNMP GET. Defaults to `5`

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout when executing a SNMP GET. Defaults to `1` second

default.description: Signals with data attributes containing results of SNMP GET

nio/SNMPTrap.description: This block provides a SNMP Trap catcher that runs inside nio.

ip_address.title: IP Address
ip_address.description: The IP address this block binds to, this address will be used by Agent to send traps to. Defaults to `127.0.0.1`.

port.title: Port
port.description: The port Agent will be connecting to. Defaults to `162`

nio/SNMPWalk.description: This block provides a SNMP walker than runs inside nio.

agent_host.title: SNMP Agent Url
agent_host.description: The host IP for the SNMP Agent to which this manager will connect. Defaults to `127.0.0.1`.

agent_port.title: SNMP Agent Port
agent_port.description: The desired port for the Agent. Defaults to `161`.

exclude_existing.title: Exclude Existing Values
exclude_existing.description: If false, the original input signal attributes will be included in the output signal.

lookup_names.title: Look up OID names
lookup_names.description: Lookup names when executing a SNMP GET. Converts to human readable string. Defaults to `False`.

lookup_values.title: Look up OID values
lookup_values.description: Lookup values when executing a SNMP GET. Converts to human readable string. Defaults to `False`

retries.title: SNMP Retries
retries.description: Number of retries when executing a SNMP GET. Defaults to `5`

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout when executing a SNMP GET. Defaults to `1` second.
